product_name: Mountainsmith Swift FX Camera Waist Pack
long_description: The Mountainsmith Swift FX camera waist pack hugs your body for comfort and stability. It ensures easy access to your camera for that unexpected moment when the perfect shot presents itself. 450-denier, 100% recycled PET polyester body fabric; 210-denier polyester lining. Ergonomic hipbelt with stabilizing straps and padded back offers a snug, comfortable fit; hipbelt fits waists up to 50 in. Organize cameras, lenses and accessories using the padded compartment panels; rip-and-stick attachment points offer customizable compartment configurations. Front zippered pocket with hardened front panel and small internal pocket provide additional storage for small items; side pocket accommodates a water bottle (sold separately). Expandable shove-it pocket behind the front pocket holds gloves, hat or a light rain jacket. Loops and lash points let you attach accessories to the pack, or strap it to a full-size Mountainsmith backpack to add extra volume. Padded shoulder strap facilitates easy hauling. Mountainsmith Swift FX camera waist pack's internal dimensions measure 7.75 x 7.5 x 5.25 in.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Swift FX camera waist pack hugs your body for comfort and stability. It ensures easy access to your camera for that unexpected moment when the perfect shot presents itself.
